office: Republican Natural Resource and Judiciary Member office

hands-on

team player
able to work under tight and simultaneously competing deadlines

key_responsibilities: coordinate and oversee the office’s legislative agenda
advise the Member on legislative activities and lead our legislative team

think strategically

review and approve legislative correspondence
project manage projects and events

think strategically
work collaboratively
experience in formulating strategic plans for advancing legislation
extensive knowledge of House legislative processes and procedures
excellent organization and communication skills
ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines

good driving record
